verses.text: \w While|strong="G1722"\w* Apollos \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w having|strong="G2532"\w* \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* upper \w country|strong="G3313"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

If so, the value of the burnt books was equivalent to about 160 man-years of wages for agricultural labourers\f*

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* growing \w and|strong="G2532"\w* becoming \w mighty|strong="G2532"\w*.
